column2: Baby Barnaby's is usually pretty packed
column3: and the small space has limited capacity. Don't be deterred
column5: when you walk or drive up. Just part the Red Sea and get your name on the clipboard quickly
column6: and wait on the patio until your name is called. Read your paper
column7: sip the complimentary coffee they usually have set out
column8: and enjoy the morning. It's well worth it.
